dict.string: CalendarNotes needs access to your calendar to sync events and provide a seamless experience.
CalendarNotes needs full access to your calendar to create, edit, and delete events.
CalendarNotes needs access to your reminders to manage your tasks.
CalendarNotes needs access to your microphone to record voice notes.
CalendarNotes needs speech recognition to convert your voice to text in notes.
CalendarNotes needs notification permission to remind you about upcoming events and tasks.
